import React from "react"; import { useState, useEffect } from "react"; import axios from "axios"; import "../invoice.css"; import { faFileInvoice } from "@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons"; import { FontAwesomeIcon } from "@fortawesome/react-fontawesome"; function Search(props) { const [data, setData] = useState([]); // const [id, setId] = useState(1); // const [subTotal, setSubTotal] = useState(0); // const [tax, setTax] = useState(0); // const [totalAmount, setTotalAmount] = useState(0); // const [clientName, setClientName] = useState(""); // const [clientPhone, setClientPhone] = useState(""); // const [validation, setValdation] = useState(false); // // set by the server side // const [invoiceId, setInvoiceId] = useState(1); // const [date, setDate] = useState(""); useEffect(async () => { try { const res = await axios.get("http://localhost:3003/getAll"); setData(res.data); console.log("this correct :", res.data); } catch (err) { console.log(err); } }, []); console.log("this data :", data); return (
{data.map((e) => { return(
ID:# {e.id}

Name:{e.clintName}

Total:${e.totalAmount}

{e.date}

) })}

); } export default Search;
